name: tts-voice-bridge
description: TTS Voice Bridge Chrome Extension - 텍스트를 음성으로 변환하여 ChatGPT와 구글 음성검색에서 사용
author: TTS Voice Bridge Team

scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode - Chrome 확장프로그램 페이지에서 dist/ 폴더를 로드하세요'
scripts.build: echo 'Building extension...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting code...' && echo 'ESLint not configured yet'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting code...' && echo 'Prettier not configured yet'
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.validate:build: npm run build && echo 'Build validation completed'
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run zip
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin --tags
scripts.release: npm run validate && npm run package && echo 'Release package created: tts-voice-bridge-v'$npm_package_version'.zip'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'TTS Voice Bridge 개발 환경이 설정되었습니다. npm run dev로 개발을 시작하세요.'
